de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer

Class GameLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer.AgdxLayer
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.layer.GameLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public abstract class GameLayer
extends AgdxLayer
    Game layer represents a level or the whole game. It contains the TileMap and the Entities

      • GameLayer

        public GameLayer(AgdxGame owner,
         TileMap map)
        Creates a new GameLayer
        Parameters:
        owner -
        map -

      • GameLayer

        public GameLayer(AgdxGame owner,
         TileMap map,
         int expCollisionTileScale)
        Creates a new GameLayer The expScale is exponential. This means: 0 : MapTiles == CollisionTiles 1 : CollisionTiles are 2 times bigger 2 : CollisionTiles are 4 times bigger -1 : CollisionTiles are 2 times smaller etc
        Parameters:
        owner -
        map -
        expCollisionTileScale - the ratio collisionMapTileSize / mapTileSize in the form [2^n]

      • scrollMapToEntity

        public void scrollMapToEntity(Entity e,
                     float gap)
        Scrolls the map so that the Entity is visible (with the defined gaps around the borders)
        Parameters:
        e - the visible entity
        gap - the gap (in tile coordinates) around all 4 edges

      • scrollMapToEntity

        public void scrollMapToEntity(Entity e,
                     float gapLeftRight,
                     float gapTopBottom)
        Scrolls the map so that the Entity is visible (with the defined gaps around the borders)
        Parameters:
        e - the visible entity
        gapLeftRight - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the two X edges
        gapTopBottom - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the two Y edges

      • scrollMapToEntity

        public void scrollMapToEntity(Entity e,
                     float gapLeft,
                     float gapRight,
                     float gapTop,
                     float gapBottom)
        Scrolls the map so that the Entity is visible (with the defined gaps around the borders)
        Parameters:
        e - the visible entity
        gapLeft - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the LEFT edge
        gapRight - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the RIGHT edge
        gapTop - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the TOP edge
        gapBottom - the gap (in tile coordinates) around the BOTTOM edge

      • addOuterMapCollisionBoxes

        public void addOuterMapCollisionBoxes()
        Adds CollisionBoxes outside of the map so that no Entities can escape This uses the standard owner 'OuterMapCollisionOwner' as an owner.

      • addOuterMapCollisionBoxes

        public void addOuterMapCollisionBoxes(CollisionGeometryOwner owner)
        Adds CollisionBoxes outside of the map so that no Entities can escape
        Parameters:
        owner - The CollisionGeometryOwner of the collisionBoxes
